meanings.sent1: The teacher nucleates the students into study groups.
meanings.sent2: The rain nucleates around tiny particles in the atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The chef nucleates the ingredients together to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: Her smile nucleates happiness in everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The seed nucleates life, sprouting into a beautiful flower.

meanings.definition: To act as a nucleus for.
meanings.sent1: The community center nucleates various activities for the residents.
meanings.sent2: The cell membrane nucleates the movement of molecules in and out of the cell.
meanings.sent3: The idea nucleates excitement among the team members.
meanings.sent4: His leadership nucleates unity and cooperation within the team.
meanings.sent5: The park nucleates a sense of calm and relaxation for visitors.
